AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.label: Arachnid worker
AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.description: Workers are the most numerous representatives of the arachnids, performing all the tasks of transporting, building and laying tunnels in solid ground for the swarm. Their shells are very thin and can crack even from being hit by a bat, which is compensated for by their high speed of movement and the ability to lift as much as they weigh themselves, thanks to four three-fingered hands. They have one pair of eyes adapted for darkness, which forces them to hide in the darkness during the day.

AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.label: Arachnid soldier
AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.description: The soldier can be found accompanying the workers. Their moderately thick shell on all sides is able to protect them from arrows from short bows. The head is also reinforced with a layer of strong chitin that can protect it from being hit by a club. The antennae are naked, which can be called their weak point if they do not have time to hide them in the head during the blow. They have a pair of three-fingered hands, a pair of claws with thick chitin, which makes them versatile representatives of the species.

AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.label: Arachnid warrior
AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.description: They have a thick shell that makes up half of their weight. They can be called the main force of the swarm. The chest plates provide excellent protection against arrows and piercing blows, and the thick carapace on the back is able to withstand a burst of small-bore weapons. They have a thick layer of chitin on the head, under which two additional sets of eyes are hidden. Unlike other subspecies, warriors do not have working limbs, which makes them practically useless outside of combat. The limbs in the form of four powerful claws and two legs are covered with only a small layer of chitin, which forces the beetle to hide the claws in the shell. Warriors usually sleep in the hive and leave it if an enemy appears that the soldiers cannot handle.

AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.label: Arachnid scholary
AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.description: A one of a kind arachnid with a semblance of scientific thinking. He is able to collate data and facts while doing research. A rather demanding and frail representative of the species, which, however, is often the core of the hive.

AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.label: Arachnid bombardier
AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.description: A one of a kind arachnid with a semblance of scientific thinking. He is able to collate data and facts while doing research. A rather demanding and frail representative of the species, which, however, is often the core of the hive.
